Name: Robot Roll
Description: Internal function when robot clicks roll
Script: if(self.hasstatus(~pcfans~)){ Rules.playerdicerange([1]); robotroll(); removestatusself(~pcfans~[;] 1); } else{ Rules.playerdicerange([1[;]2[;]3[;]4[;]5[;]6]); robotroll(); } if(self.roll_error && self.getvar(~jackpotonerror~)) adjustrobotcounter(0);
